com.ABCjobs.communityportal.ABCJobsPteLtd.Repository

Interface UserInformationRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserInformation,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserInformation,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<UserInformation,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<UserInformation>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<UserInformation,Integer>

    public interface UserInformationRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserInformation,Integer>
    UserInformationRepository --- Data Access Object that interacts with the user information table from the database
    Author:
    John Daniel Tejero

    • Method Detail

      • userProfile

        @Query(value="select u from UserInformation u where u.userID = :id")
UserInformation userProfile(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                  int id)
        Selects user information by means of using user_id as its selector
        Parameters:
        id - int type parameter that specify records to collect inside the user_information table

      • updatePublicInfo

        @Modifying
 @Query(value="update UserInformation u set u.contactNumber = :contact, u.jobPosition = :job, u.displayName = :dname, u.address = :address, u.city = :city, u.country = :country, u.nationality = :nationality, u.company=:company, u.bio = :bio where userID = :uid")
void updatePublicInfo(@Param(value="uid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          int userID,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="contact")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String contact,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="job")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String job,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="dname")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String dname,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="address")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String address,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="country")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String country,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="city")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String city,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="nationality")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String nationality,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="bio")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String bio,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="company")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String company)
        Custom query for updation of user_information
        Parameters:
        int - userID specifies which record to be updated
        string - contact a new data to be inserted inside the record
        string - job a new data which will overwrite current existing job data
        string - dname a new data which will overwrite current existing display name data
        string - address a new data which will overwrite current existing address data
        string - country a new data which will overwrite current existing country data
        string - city a new data which will overwrite current existing city data
        string - nationality a new data which will overwrite current existing nationality data
        string - bio a new data which will overwrite current existing bio data
        string - company a new data which will overwrite current company data

      • findByUserID

        UserInformation findByUserID(int id)
        JPA method which retrieves user information
        Parameters:
        int - id automatically retrieves user_information record by ID

      • updatePublicImg

        @Modifying
 @Query(value="update UserInformation u set u.banner = :banner, u.displayPicture = :displayPic where userID =:id")
void updatePublicImg(@Param(value="banner")
                                                                                                                                                     String banner,
                                                                                                                                                     @Param(value="displayPic")
                                                                                                                                                     String picture,
                                                                                                                                                     @Param(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                     int id)
        Custom method and custom query used to update image and banner image path for the user_information table
        Parameters:
        String - banner a new data which will replace the current record of banner
        String - picture a new data which will replace the current record of image
        int - id specifies which user_information to be updated by means of user_id
